pages.text: Obtained by mining $(l:contentcraft:xaenon/xaenon_ore)Xaenon Ore$(), $(l:contentcraft:xaenon/raw_xaenon)Raw Xaenon$() can be smelted to produce $(l:contentcraft:xaenon/xaenon_ingot)Xaenon Ingots$(), a vital component for advanced crafting.
This unrefined material is exclusively sourced from $(l:contentcraft:xaenon/xaenon_ore)Xaenon Ore$(), found in the depths of the End.
